textarena.wrappers.ActionWrappers package¶

Submodules¶

textarena.wrappers.ActionWrappers.clip_action_wrapper module¶

class textarena.wrappers.ActionWrappers.clip_action_wrapper.ClipCharactersActionWrapper(env: Env, max_num_characters: int)[source]¶

Bases: ActionWrapper

Action wrapper that limits actions to a maximum number of characters.

This wrapper truncates the player’s action if it exceeds the specified maximum number of characters.

action(action: str) → str[source]¶

Truncates the action to the maximum number of characters.

Parameters:

action (str) – The original action.

Returns:

The truncated action.

Return type:

str

class textarena.wrappers.ActionWrappers.clip_action_wrapper.ClipWordsActionWrapper(env: Env, max_num_words: int)[source]¶

Bases: ActionWrapper

Action wrapper that limits actions to a maximum number of words.

This wrapper truncates the player’s action if it exceeds the specified maximum number of words.

action(action: str) → str[source]¶

Truncates the action to the maximum number of words.

Parameters:

action (str) – The original action.

Returns:

The truncated action.
